languages.text: Шпиль кабала Опустошительной бури полон враждебных ксеносов, смертельных ловушек и стонов страждущих. Где-то в лабиринте его темных недр друкари и держат плененных провидцев.

traits.locale_text: Шпиль кабала Опустошительной Бури полон враждебных ксеносов, смертельных ловушек и стонов страждущих. Где-то в лабиринте его темных недр друкари и держат плененных провидцев.

languages.text: The Spire of the Reaving Tempest is filled with hostile xenos, deadly traps, and moans of suffering. The captured Farseers are being held somewhere in its labyrinthine depths.
languages.original_text: Шпиль кабала Опустошительной бури полон враждебных ксеносов, смертельных ловушек и стонов страждущих. Где-то в лабиринте его темных недр друкари и держат плененных провидцев.

traits.locale_text: The Reaving Tempest spire is filled with hostile xenos, deadly traps, and moans of suffering. The captured Farseers are held somewhere in its labyrinthine depths.
The Spire of the Reaving Tempest is filled with hostile xenos, deadly traps, and moans of suffering. The captured Farseers are being held somewhere in its labyrinthine depths.
The Spire of the Reaving Tempest is filled with hostile xenos, deadly traps, and moans of suffering. The captured Farseers are being held somewhere in its labyrinthine depths.

languages.text: La tour de la Tempête ravageuse est remplie de xénos hostiles, de pièges mortels et des échos de cris de souffrance. Les Grands Prophètes capturés sont détenus quelque part dans ses profondeurs labyrinthiques.
languages.original_text: The Spire of the Reaving Tempest is filled with hostile xenos, deadly traps, and moans of suffering. The captured Farseers are being held somewhere in its labyrinthine depths.

traits.locale_text: La tour de la Tempête ravageuse est remplie de xénos hostiles, de pièges mortels et des échos de cris de souffrance. Les Grands Prophètes capturés sont détenus quelque part dans ses profondeurs labyrinthiques.

languages.text: 狂风阴谋团的尖塔中充满了敌对的异形、致命的陷阱与痛苦的呻吟，遭到俘虏的先知被关押在迷宫般的尖塔深处。
languages.original_text: The Spire of the Reaving Tempest is filled with hostile xenos, deadly traps, and moans of suffering. The captured Farseers are being held somewhere in its labyrinthine depths.

traits.locale_text: 狂风阴谋团的尖塔中充满了敌对的异形、致命的陷阱与痛苦的呻吟，遭到俘虏的先知被关押在迷宫般的尖塔深处。

languages.text: 略奪の嵐の尖塔は、敵対する異種族、死の罠、苦悩のうめき声で満ちている。囚われた先見司たちは、その迷宮のどこか奥深くに監禁されている。
languages.original_text: The Spire of the Reaving Tempest is filled with hostile xenos, deadly traps, and moans of suffering. The captured Farseers are being held somewhere in its labyrinthine depths.

traits.locale_text: 略奪の嵐の尖塔は、敵対する異種族、死の罠、苦悩のうめき声で満ちている。囚われた先見司たちは、その迷宮のどこか奥深くに監禁されている。

languages.text: Der Turm des plündernden Sturms ist voll von feindseligen Xenos, tödlichen Fallen und qualvollen Schreien. Die gefangen genommenen Runenpropheten werden irgendwo in seinen labyrinthartigen Tiefen festgehalten.
languages.original_text: The Spire of the Reaving Tempest is filled with hostile xenos, deadly traps, and moans of suffering. The captured Farseers are being held somewhere in its labyrinthine depths.

traits.locale_text: Der Turm des plündernden Sturms ist voll von feindseligen Xenos, tödlichen Fallen und qualvollen Schreien. Die gefangen genommenen Runenpropheten werden irgendwo in seinen labyrinthartigen Tiefen festgehalten.

languages.text: La torre de la Tempestad Asoladora está llena de xenos hostiles, trampas mortales y gemidos de sufrimiento. Los videntes capturados están retenidos en sus laberínticas profundidades.
languages.original_text: The Spire of the Reaving Tempest is filled with hostile xenos, deadly traps, and moans of suffering. The captured Farseers are being held somewhere in its labyrinthine depths.

traits.locale_text: La torre de la Tempestad Asoladora está llena de xenos hostiles, trampas mortales y gemidos de sufrimiento. Los videntes capturados están retenidos en sus laberínticas profundidades.

languages.text: Müfteris Kasırga Kulesi; düşman zenolarla, ölümcül tuzaklarla ve acılı inlemelerle dolu. Ele geçirilen Ötesezenler, labirente benzer derinliklerinde tutuluyor.
languages.original_text: The Spire of the Reaving Tempest is filled with hostile xenos, deadly traps, and moans of suffering. The captured Farseers are being held somewhere in its labyrinthine depths.
